extension.summary: Chains Matrix Wizard is a lightweight template for installing builds on Kodi 19 Matrix. Has some code from Aftermath Wizard by Surfacingx. Skin Switch by OpenELEQ. Base code by BYB. Credits to them and all others who contributed. Please report any bugs to Chains on Telegram/Twitter.
